page.title: 13Steeple Langford Recreation
page.content: These are some of the things that people like doing in their spare time. There is a{cricket}pitch in Steeple Langford and a sports pavillion where they get changed and have their refreshments . They play cricket five days a week. The Saturday team play in the Hampshire League.In Steeple Langford there are two{football}teams. There is a{tennis}court and people like playing tennis.{Riding}is popular and there are the Wylye Horse Trials every year.A lot of people like {fishing}in the river and lake and there is pheasant{shooting}in the countryside around.People like going to{pubs}to have a drink and play{darts and{pool.}Watching{television}is very popular,and people like playing{bingo.
